title: Machine Learning Competency Strengthening: Content-Based English Teaching Method Improvement for Early Childhood Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Participants can accurately apply communication strategies using multi-word units tailored to early childhood education contexts at over 80% accuracy.
Participants can distinguish and use specialized terminology and everyday expressions through pronunciation and form-meaning mappings awareness training.
Participants can design at least three types of English activity materials for young children and establish implementation plans using self-directed learning strategies.
Participants can develop and present at least five situational dialogues that explain scientific concepts at a preschool level.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
